game.name: Bears Adventures
game.description:
It is really amazing to explore the best adventure games for boys on the best online gaming platform! We through atmegame have brought to you a real adventure challenge to surprise your gaming senses to the fullest. Join Bears Adventures and get ready to enter the world full of entertainment and thrill! In this free online 3D game, you will meet with the cute bears who need your help urgently. Give your helping hands to them to complete their mission and make them feel proud on you!

These bears are from different places across the world and have different missions to explore. Choose from a wide number of characters as per your wish in this cute animal game! Play wisely and earn some extra points to make your character stronger than before! Get ready to face different dangerous enemies to complete different missions of bears! Move and jump your character by arrow keys or WASD and shoot your enemies using the space key! Use extra skill with mouse in this highly addictive runner game!

Playing the role of a bear with various abilities to upgrade your skills is a big fun in this HTML5 platform adventure game! Each level comes with unique challenges, difficulties and characters. Itâ€™s up to you which one you choose to be from a FBI bear or a forest bear. In this cool animal game, you also have to collect the coins and diamonds to unlock the helpers. Try to find all the stars you see on the screen to finish each level successfully! Apply your brain to win this highly addictive 3D adventure challenge!
